item.title: Who’s Crying? Not Roger Daltrey and Pete Townshend, but Most Everyone Else During the Who’s Hollywood Bowl Farewell Shows — Concert Review
item.description: I can say that I did not expect to be leaving the Who’s visit to the Hollywood Bowl this week holding myself back from breaking into complete bawling. Yes, it’s a farewell tour, and one we

item.title: The Who Bring the House Down at Hollywood Bowl Farewell Show
item.description: The legendary band tore through some of their greatest hits like “Baba O’Riley” and “My Generation” during the first of two concerts in Los Angeles Wednesday night.
